author: Ed Crocker
description:
Three years ago Hiron Ennes burst onto the speculative scene with the startlingly original and compelling post-apocalyptic sci-fi, gothic suspense, and body horror mash-up Leech, essentially The Thing meets Rebecca, which gave us the memorable POV of a parasite. It was the kind of debut that fast forwards an author to must-buy status, and now […]

The post REVIEW: The Works of Vermin by Hiron Ennes appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Works of Vermin by Hiron Ennes
